ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ tyě pɔ́ páʼ pìdte mekwò la.
en: You stand like one who has arched feet.

ngiemboon: Pʉ̀a pie n toŋó wɔ́b, pɔ́ kaa tóo.
en: The people I called did not come.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n dúɔ mmó fʉ̀ʼʉ kɔ́ wɔ́, á ná pɔ́ méjʉʼ lê pilé.
en: Whenever I ask for something, he always gives an insignificant amount.

ngiemboon: Peg gyǎ píme mélùʼ mbà á tsǐ tsɛ̀ɛ menzsǒ mé.
en: We saw a drunk who had urinated in his clothes.

ngiemboon: Agʉ̀a té nò wɔ́, apìŋ zɔ̌ nò.
en: The way there is not difficult, it is the return that is.

ngiemboon: Áa na ngiembɔɔn, mé té ŋweʼe «b» nzyté té vɔg ŋweʼe pìŋe ndù «m» wɔ́.

en: Make a movement with your hand.
